[![](https://i1.wp.com/static.flickr.com/25/53159594_b027d22a2f.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/53159594/ "photo sharing") [Smokin’](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/53159594/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
Lord, I’ve been slack over the last week, haven’t I? I’ve been busy at work � the harder things are at the mag, the less mental energy I have for the blog, alas. And having two other blogs to write for doesn’t help. However, I did promise you some observations about France, so here’s a really obvious one: smoking is so much more prevalent over there still, particularly amongst the women. This is, of course, a flimsy excuse to post this picture�
